CutSceneText.Text: If there's anything you may need, just say the word, Daeva.
I know everything you've done, Hippolytus.
It wasn't me who killed him.
I'm only what I appear to be--
It will not help you to deny it.
Philipemos wrote down everything in his diary,
and Actaeon has the missing pages.
Face your punishment in the name of the Five.
Ha-ha-ha! Perhaps you're a Shadow, too. Well, I'm not afraid of you, Shadow!
